title: BlackPlayer EX v20.10 Patched (CTRC)
description:
[center][img]http://image.rexdl.com/android/app/blackplayer-ex.jpg[/img]

[b]Requirements:[/b] 2.3.3+

[b]Overview:[/b] BlackPlayer Exclusive - Premium MP3 Music Player Description

[b]Extra features:[/b]
- Folder view
- 6 Extra Fonts
- 10 Color accents.
- 3 Extra Themes
- White Widget theme.
- Customizable crossfading
- Customize the Library pages completely. Add, Remove and sort.
- Custom grid size for Artist & Albums.
- Show Bitrate, samplingrate and format in Now Playing page.
- Manually search and set Artist images.
- Blacklist Folders and Tracks
- White widget theme.
- Zap, discover your music fast with this smart function. Auto plays random music tracks for 5 seconds each.
- Floating window control widget
- Visualizer, customizable (Beta)
- Widget and Notification customizations.
- View Artists as bigger grid.
- View Genres as List and as Big list.
- Played Tracks can be tracked monthly instead of weekly.
- Blur effect to Lockscreen or Widget.
- 2 Extra text animations
- 1 Extra transition effect
- Developer love!
- More upcoming features! EX version always gets the new features first!
Notes
- Try out the free version before you buy.
- This is a separate app. The Library, Playlists and Favorite tracks are shared between the Free and EX versions.

[b]BlackPlayer standard features:[/b]

- Plays standard locally stored music files, such as mp3, flac and wav.
- Build-in Equalizer, BassBoost, Virtualizer, Left/Right sound balance.
- Gapless playback
- Tag editor
- 3D Transition effects
- 3 Widgets
- Lyrics viewing and editing.
- Lockscreen control support
- Sleep Timer
- Interchangeable fonts and themes.
- Weekly most played tracks

[b]WHAT'S NEW[/b]

20.10 - January 5
- (EX Only) Activated the Playlist Export function (long press on the Playlist you want to export). Both Playlist Import and Export are still in beta! Playlist will be exported to the external storage root.
- Added option to customize the Now Playing background color if the 'Background' setting is set to 'Black'.
- Added Flat Folder view structure, when enabled; all Folders with tracks will be displayed in a list. Enable in Interface settings.
- Added option to remove duplicates from a Playlist, found at the overflow icon (3 dots) when browsing a Playlist.
- Added option to remove duplicates from the play queue, found in the overflow icon in queue page.
- Added option to hide the 'Unknown' Artist. Activate it in 'Metadata' Settings.
- Removed option 'Crossfade Next Track', always enabled.
- Minor top navigation changes. Slightly improved the layout for tablets.
- Minor crash fix with Playlist importing.
- Minor fix with Artist 'Queue' function, did a 'Play Next' instead of 'Queue'.
- Minor bugfix with 'Animate Album pager' if 'Previous Track mode' was Classic.
- Tried to fix issues with 'Share' track if the path had strange characters.
- More translations added.[/center]

[center][img]http://extraimago.com/images/2015/11/08/oPEExeG.png[/img][/center]
